item.name: {HOSTNAME}: Oracle TCP/{$ORACLE_SERVICE_PORT} check
item.description: Check if oracle is listening on {$ORACLE_SERVICE_PORT}

item.name: ORACLE: Number of not Online Disks
item.description: Show if there are disks with status != ONLINE on the ASM Disks

item.name: ORACLE: TOP concurrent queryes
item.description: The command running with: - more than {$TOP_COMMAND_CONCURRENCY_QTD} sessions - for more than {$TOP_COMMAND_CONCURRENCY_TIME} seconds

item.name: ORACLE: Top queries from last 10min
item.description: Show top queries from the last 10 minutes

discovery_rule.name: uorapy: db_owners_lld
discovery_rule.description:
Return the owners that should be checked. You need to set this in the CONFIG file as:
"owners_to_check" : [ {"#OWNER" : "FOO"}, {"#OWNER" : "BAR"}, {"#OWNER" : "OTHER"} ]

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME}: Invalid FUNCTIONS detected on owner {#OWNER}
trigger_prototype.description: There are invalid FUNCTIONS on the oracle database

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME}: Invalid PACKAGES detected on owner {#OWNER}
trigger_prototype.description: There are invalid PACKAGES on the oracle database

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME}: Invalid PACKAGE_BODIES detected on owner {#OWNER}
trigger_prototype.description: There are invalid PACKAGE_BODIES on the oracle database

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME}: Invalid PROCEDURES detected on owner {#OWNER}
trigger_prototype.description: There are invalid PROCEDURES on the oracle database

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME}: Invalid TRIGGERS detected on owner {#OWNER}
trigger_prototype.description: There are invalid TRIGGERS on the oracle database

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME}: Invalid VIEWS detected on owner {#OWNER}
trigger_prototype.description: There are invalid VIEWS on the oracle database

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME}: Unusable INDEXES detected on owner {#OWNER}
trigger_prototype.description: There are indexes with staths "ususable" on the oracle database

discovery_rule.name: uorapy: disk_groups_lld
discovery_rule.description: Return all the DiskGroups from the database.

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME}: Oracle DiskGroup {#DGNAME} free space warning
trigger_prototype.description: The free size of the Disk Group is less than {$UORAPY_DISKGROUP_FREE_SIZE_WARNING}

discovery_rule.name: uorapy: tablespaces_lld
discovery_rule.description: Return all the tablespaces from the database.

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME}: Can't connect on oracle port TCP/{$ORACLE_SERVICE_PORT}
{HOSTNAME}: There are disks with status != ONLINE on the ORACLE ASM
{HOSTNAME}: Too much active sessions
trigger.description: The number of active sessions on the Oracle Database has reach the warning level {$UORAPY_ACTIVE_SESSIONS_NUMBER_WARNING}
